title: Johnny Karate Super Awesome Musical Explosion Show
featuredTitle: Johnny Karate Super Awesome Musical Explosion Show
description: The only show that’s all about learning, music, animals, fireworks, water skis, and above all… ice cream, pizza, ninjas, getting stronger, sharks vs. bears, and above all… karate!
starring: Andy Dwyer, Perd Hapley, Leslie Knope, Ron Swanson, April Ludgate-Karate-Dwyer, Ben Wyatt, Gary Gergrench, Donna Meagle
creator: Andy Dwyer
alt1: Donna Meagle as the Chief talking with FBI agent, Burt Macklin
